main event: A red spot was observed in the sky by a Virginia housewife on August 7, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed at night and was described as round and orange in color.
The object was visually observed from the ground.
The weather conditions were clear with a slight breeze, and the temperature was 82 degrees Fahrenheit.
Wind speeds and directions were provided for various altitudes, indicating that meteorological data was collected.
The sighting was reported through official military channels, likely as part of the Project Blue Book program.
sighted object: a red spot in the sky
